org.freezedry.persistence.tree

Class InfoNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freezedry.persistence.tree.InfoNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable<InfoNode>

    public class InfoNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements Copyable<InfoNode>
    InfoNode that holds the information about the field/class it represents. In effect, the root InfoNode forms the semantic model representing the object to be persisted.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  InfoNode.NodeType
      Represents the types of nodes

    • Constructor Detail

      • InfoNode

        private InfoNode(InfoNode.NodeType nodeType,
        java.lang.String fieldName,
        java.lang.Object value,
        java.lang.String persistName,
        java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
        java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?> constructor,
        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.reflect.Method> setFieldMap,
        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.reflect.Method> getFieldMap)
        Creates an InfoNode with the specified characteristics
        Parameters:
        nodeType - The type of InfoNode as held in the nodeType enum.
        fieldName - The name of the field to persist
        value - The value of the node (or the value of the field it represents)
        persistName - The name with which to persist the field
        clazz - The type of the field
        constructor - The constructor to use for instantiation (not yet implemented)
        setFieldMap - The map that is used to determine the method that is called for setting a field (not yet implemented)
        getFieldMap - The map that is used to determine the method that is called for setting a field (not yet implemented)

      • getGenericParameterTypes

        public final java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Type> getGenericParameterTypes()
        Returns:
        a list of generic type parameters held by the field of this node

      • setGenericParameterTypes

        public final void setGenericParameterTypes(java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Type> types)
        Allows the user to set the list of generic types held by this node. This is useful for complex types where the a generic class may not be associated with a field. For example, the inner map of a Map< String, Map< String, Double > > doesn't have a field, and during the parsing, the child nodes of the outer map can be populated with the String and Double of the inner map for later use.
        Parameters:
        types - a list of generic type parameters held by the field of this node

      • addGenericParameterType

        public final void addGenericParameterType(java.lang.reflect.Type type)
        Allows the user to set the list of generic types held by this node. This is useful for complex types where the a generic class may not be associated with a field. For example, the inner map of a Map< String, Map< String, Double > > doesn't have a field, and during the parsing, the child nodes of the outer map can be populated with the String and Double of the inner map for later use.
        Parameters:
        type - a generic type parameter held by the field of this node

      • getCopy

        public InfoNode getCopy()
        Description copied from interface: Copyable
        Creates and returns a copy of the object x that meets the following criteria
        1. The expressions x.getCopy() != x evaluates as true
        2. The expressions x.getCopy().equals( x ) evaluates as true
        3. The expressions x.getCopy().getClass() == x.getClass() evaluates as true
        Specified by:
        getCopy in interface Copyable<InfoNode>
        Returns:
        a copy of the object that meets the above criteria
